friendly_name.description: A nicely-formatted version of the phone number.

phone_number.description: The phone number, in E.164 (i.e. '+1') format.

lata.description: The LATA of this phone number.

rate_center.description: The rate center of this phone number.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of this phone number.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of this phone number.

region.description: The two-letter state or province abbreviation of this phone number.

postal_code.description: The postal (zip) code of this phone number.

iso_country.description: The ISO country code of this phone number.
